Methods

CreateMauiApp()

When overridden in a derived class, creates the MauiApp to be used in this application. Typically a MauiApp is created by calling CreateBuilder(bool), configuring the returned MauiAppBuilder, and returning the built app by calling Build().

protected override MauiApp CreateMauiApp()

Returns

MauiApp

The built MauiApp.
